snippet: Houston Ballet made its debut at the Joyce Theater and also introduced a new piece, Jorma Elo’s “ONE/end/ONE,” which was the inaugural recipient of the Rudolph Nureyev Prize for New Dance.
lead_paragraph: Houston Ballet made its debut at the Joyce Theater and also introduced a new piece, Jorma Elo’s “ONE/end/ONE,” which was the inaugural recipient of the Rudolph Nureyev Prize for New Dance.

headline.main: Acrobatics, Doll-Like Movements and Coy Gestures
headline.print_headline: Acrobatics, Doll-Like Movements and Coy Gestures
headline.seo: Houston Ballet at the Joyce Theater - Review
